item.title: Online Gambling and Taxes
item.description: When it comes to online gambling and taxes, it is important for players to realize that they must comply with their local legislation when considering taxes.

item.title: Can Someone Help Me While Gambling Online
item.description: Myth: There is no one to help when gambling online.

item.title: Online Casinos Are Using Rigged Software
item.description: An ongoing myth with online gambling, which is indeed a very popular myth and one that has originated since the early times, is that online casinos use rigged software.

item.title: Gambling Online Is Not Legal
item.description: Myth: Gambling online is not legal. The facts: Many rumours have circulated that gambling online in casinos is, in fact, illegal.

item.title: Offshore Companies and Money Laundering
item.description: Myth: There is a myth in online gambling which says that money laundering is more susceptible to online casinos than land-based casinos.

item.title: Online Casinos Do Not Pay
item.description: Myth: Online casinos do not pay. The facts: When choosing an online casino it is vitally important to carry out your research first, as the key to having a secure and honourable gaming experience is ‘research’.

item.title: Online vs Land Based Casinos
item.description: These days, the glamorous world of gambling is not the preserve of just the select few.

item.title: UIGEA and Why It Changed the Whole Industry
item.description: In 2002, the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit ruled that the Federal Wire Act prohibited electronic transmission of information for sports betting across all telecommunication lines, but affirmed a lower court ruling that in fact the Wire Act “in plain language” does not actually prohibit internet gambling on a game of chance.

item.title: Affiliates
item.description: Hand in hand with online casinos come affiliates and casino affiliate programs, which can cover a wide variety of games like poker, casino, sports and bingo.

item.title: Gaming Software Companies
item.description: Software companies are those companies that provide the hundreds of games you find in an online casino and there is a multitude of software companies out there.

item.title: Online Casinos
item.description: There is currently an extensive amount of online casinos that can be found on the internet today.

item.title: Forms of Online Gambling
item.description: Since gambling spread to the internet, it has found numerous ways to form online.

item.title: History of Online Gambling
item.description: Gambling originates back to the year 1856 with land casinos, and gambling itself was practised in the United States mainly in the form of lotteries.
